cast.overview: When the seaside community of Amity finds itself under attack by a dangerous great white shark, the town's chief of police, a young marine biologist, and a grizzled hunter embark on a desperate quest to destroy the beast before it strikes again.
cast.title: Jaws

cast.overview: Clue finds six colorful dinner guests gathered at the mansion of their host, Mr. Boddy -- who turns up dead after his secret is exposed: He was blackmailing all of them. With the killer among them, the guests and Boddy's chatty butler must suss out the culprit before the body count rises.
cast.title: Clue

details.biography:
Jeffrey Kramer (born 15 July 1945) is an American actor and producer.

details.name: Jeffrey Kramer
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
